content: Your last point on James Hanna isn’t fair because it doesn’t take into consideration that TEs can contribute to a team’s success without being receiving threats. Hanna started on STs, but really broke out in 2014. He is a mean blocker, and his play definitely factored into Murray’s success. He’s been banged up in the past two years, but recently signed a 3yr extension. He’s a big part of the Cowboys rushing attack, even if he doesn’t give much as a receiver.
